data.text: Elihu mɔn yi siga falan ma, a naxa,
“I mɔn xa tin ndedi, n xa i xaran,
N nan n ma kolonna fenma yire makuyen nin,
Wule mi n ma falane ra mumɛ.
“Ala sɛnbɛn gbo yati,
A mi ɲaxudene luma e nii ra.
A mi a xun xanbi soma tinxin muxune yi,
Xa e xidixi yɔlɔnxɔnne ra,
Ala e kɛwanle nan makɛnɛnma e xa na kiini,
A yi e xaran,
Xa e tuli mati,
Xa e mi a ramɛ,
“Ala kolontarene nan xɔlɔn namarama,
E faxama e foningeyaan nin,
Koni, Ala tɔrɔ muxune rakisima
A i tan fan bama nɛn tɔrɔni,
“Koni iki,
Nayi, xɔlɔn nama i radin
I ya nafunle i bɛ tɔrɔni ba?
A xɔli nama i suxu kɔɛɛn xa so,
A liga i yeren ma!
I xa a kolon
Nde kiraan yitaxi a ra?
“I nama ɲinan Alaa wanle matɔxɔn ma,
adamadiine birin nɔɛ naxanye toɛ,
Ala gbo yati,
A na igen nate wuyenni kore,
Na tulen yi keli kundane yi,
Nde nɔɛ kundaan nafala kiin kolonɲɛ,
A mato, a kuyen ɲin masɔxɔnna raminima a rabilinni,
A yamaan makitima na tulen nan xɔn,
A galanna tongoma a yii firinne nan na,
A kuye sarinna a fa feen nan mayitama,
